General.Name: HI SPAC 3
General.Description: Russell Co., Ltd. engages in refurbishment, modification, reinstallation, and process conversion of equipment for the semiconductor industry. The company offers flash HDD for semiconductor, LCD, and IT application; floppy driver; and touch monitors. It also provides factory automation systems; LED products, such as plasma-enhanced CVD systems; and repair services for ceramic heaters. In addition, the company offers parts for various equipment. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Cheongju, South Korea.
